posting_times.evidence: Industry research (Later, RecurPost 2025): stories spread through the day catch different audience segments

visual_style.current_best: lifelike casual photography feel, natural indoor or outdoor lighting, slightly imperfect composition to feel authentic, no text or overlays in generated image
visual_style.color_trends: warm natural tones, slight film grain or soft overexposure for authentic phone-camera feel
visual_style.hook_style: visually striking first frame with emotional resonance or curiosity gap â€” no text hooks
visual_style.ai_generation_notes: Prompt for casual phone-photo aesthetic: natural lighting, slightly off-center composition, shallow depth of field. Request subtle imperfections (film grain, warm color cast) to avoid over-polished AI look. Leave visual space for Instagram native stickers (polls, questions). Use sequential frames with consistent style for story arcs. Negative prompts: no text, no watermarks, no perfect symmetry.

caption_patterns.emoji_usage: 1-2 emojis as openers, keep it minimal
